rooms.description: Grand entrance hall with foyer to welcome guests
Open and airy living space with ample natural light
Cozy dining area adjacent to the kitchen
Fully equipped modern kitchen with ample storage and ventilation
Compact servant's quarters with a small living area and ensuite

openings.description: Main entrance door leading to the foyer
Service door connecting kitchen to outdoor garden area
Spacious balcony overlooking the garden, ensuring Vastu compliance with open space
